00022 struct arma_version
00023   {
00024   static const unsigned int major = 0;
00025   static const unsigned int minor = 9;
00026   static const unsigned int patch = 52;
00027   
00028   static
00029   inline
00030   std::string
00031   as_string()
00032     {
00033     const char* nickname = "Monkey Wrench";
00034     
00035     std::stringstream ss;
00036     ss << arma_version::major
00037        << '.'
00038        << arma_version::minor
00039        << '.'
00040        << arma_version::patch
00041        << " ("
00042        << nickname
00043        << ')';
00044     
00045     return ss.str();
00046     }
00047   };
